message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000.  It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know your thoughts!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,000. This still gives you a good price, and it allows me to get closer to my desired value. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
